title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 239: Featuring Ron MacLean
description:
On Monday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Ron MacLean (48:26) from Hockey Night in Canada and Hometown Hockey. Ron joins to talk about Don Cherry, Hometown Hockey, his legendary career and tons more. The guys are also in St. Louis for the NHL All Star game, so they recap their entire trip, the meet and greet, all the interviews, the alumni game and a bunch more. The boys wrap up with hilarious story from Whit and a Gambling Corner (02:19:08) from Rear Admiral.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
